data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Board Meeting Of CNL To Be Held On 05-Feb-2026 To Inter-Alia Consider And Approve The Unaudited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results For The Quarter Ended On 31St December 2025
data.news_body: Creative Newtech Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 05/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve Board Meeting of CNL to be held on 05-Feb-2026 to inter-alia consider and approve the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial results for the Quarter ended on 31st December 2025

data.caption: Creative Newtech Limited Announces Pan-India Distribution Agreement With EIZO Private Limited (Indian Subsidiary Of EIZO Corporation Japan.)

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Creative Newtech Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from December 09 2025 the Equity Shares of Creative Newtech Ltd (Scrip Code: 544631) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20251208-51 dated December 08 2025.

data.caption: Updates
data.news_body: Creative Newtech Limited has informed the Exchange regarding 'Media Release on Listing of Creative Newtech Limited on the BSE Main Board'.

data.caption: Symbol Change of company
data.news_body: CREATIVE: Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that trading symbol of Creative Newtech Limited shall be changed to CNL w.e.f. December 10, 2025.
